name: Riichi Calc - Japanese Mahjong Calculator
description: Riichi Calc is an easy to use app that takes any valid Japanese mahjong hand and calculates all possible winning combinations. A great companion for any Japanese mahjong player! Feel free to e-mail me about any calculation errors.   Features:  Used for the Japanese variant of Mahjong  Order is irrelevant. The app will rearrange the tiles for you  Determine waits of a tenpai hand  Provides warnings against illegal combinations (e.g. riichi with an open hand)  Calculate points using han and fu as the input  Display terminology in English or romanized Japanese
